titles.title: Equal Remedies Act of 2007
A bill to amend section 1977A of the Revised Statutes to equalize the remedies available under that section.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 8/1/2007--Introduced. Equal Remedies Act of 2007 - Removes the limits on the dollar amount of damages awardable, in cases of intentional employment discrimination, for pecuniary and nonpecuniary losses and punitive damages.
